CustomField.label: Number of successful org authorizations
CustomField.description: The number of times that a user on the team has successfully authorized an org. It's the total number across the team, so correlates with the size of the team as each member configures their own orgs. It can be inflated by sandbox refreshes and reauthing
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of times that a user on the team has successfully authorized an org. It's the total number across the team, so correlates with the size of the team as each member configures their own orgs. It can be inflated by sandbox refreshes and reauthing
